name: Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized script was executed, allowing an attacker to escalate privileges and exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--4bfe8410-3fcc-4ec6-9a74-669548d3.name: Kill malicious process
action--4bfe8410-3fcc-4ec6-9a74-669548d3.description: Terminate any PowerShell processes to mitigate the execution of ongoing malicious scripts.

action--f29c3b1e-a9d5-43b4-bb67-30a456bb.name: Isolate affected host
action--f29c3b1e-a9d5-43b4-bb67-30a456bb.description: Isolate the affected host to prevent further exploitation.

parallel--7db2f26b-5aa6-4a69-b781-1e767a.name: Execute follow-up actions
parallel--7db2f26b-5aa6-4a69-b781-1e767a.description: Perform actions in parallel to enhance security.

action--77e4beaf-e9b7-4e48-9ab1-221c1c40.name: Scan for additional threats
action--77e4beaf-e9b7-4e48-9ab1-221c1c40.description: Perform a scan on the affected system to find additional threats.

while-condition--scan-loop.name: Scan until clean
while-condition--scan-loop.description: Loop to continue scanning until the system is clean.

action--e79cdd9d-c2f0-4f66-b2e8-e4b7e3be.name: Review access logs
action--e79cdd9d-c2f0-4f66-b2e8-e4b7e3be.description: Review access logs for any unauthorized access attempts.

action--bec1e08b-f0c6-4f55-82d1-aa75b1e5.name: Update security policies
action--bec1e08b-f0c6-4f55-82d1-aa75b1e5.description: Document and update security policies to prevent future incidents.
